promptPrefix: Based on the title, generate the recipe including preparation time,  cook time, total time, Serves, Ingredients, Directions, and NUTRITION FACTS  in horizontal lines words distribution as example Calories: 420 | Total Fat: 14g | Saturated Fat: 2g | Cholesterol: 186mg | Sodium: 1513mg | Total Carbohydrates: 49g | Dietary Fiber: 5g | Sugar: 6g | Protein: 24g and also request NUTRITION FACTS never be vertical line  [TARGETLANGUAGE] [PROMPT]
title: Food recipe
